Class ThermometerViewer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.ui.devices.PhysicalMeasureInstrument<Temperature>
org.jscience.ui.devices.ThermometerViewer
public class ThermometerViewer extends PhysicalMeasureInstrument<Temperature>
A thermometer viewer for temperature display. Renders a classic mercury-style thermometer.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
